enchantment.description: The enchantment required to activate this power.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The enchantment required to activate this power.

base_value.description: The base value of the extra damage.
base_value.markdownDescription: The base value of the extra damage.

damage_condition.description: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only apply if the dealt damage fulfills this condition.
damage_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only apply if the dealt damage fulfills this condition.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only apply if either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity that has been hit) fulfills this bi-entity condition type.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only apply if either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity that has been hit) fulfills this bi-entity condition type.

target_condition.description: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only be applied if the entity/entities that has been hit fulfills this condition.
target_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified base value with the modifier(s) applied and/or action(s) will only be applied if the entity/entities that has been hit fulfills this condition.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the base value. Modifiers will be applied as many times as `enchantment_level - 1` the power holder has of the specified enchantment.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the base value. Modifiers will be applied as many times as `enchantment_level - 1` the power holder has of the specified enchantment.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the base value. Modifiers will be applied as many times as `enchantment_level - 1` the power holder has of the specified enchantment.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the base value. Modifiers will be applied as many times as `enchantment_level - 1` the power holder has of the specified enchantment.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this bi-entity action type will be executed on either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity that has been hit).
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this bi-entity action type will be executed on either or both 'actor' (the entity that has the power) and 'target' (the entity that has been hit).
